post:
BodHOST is your one stop shop for complete hosting solutions. Our latest updated VPS plans have been announced and we have come up with some solid performance oriented configurations. You asked for it and the plans are there for you to see. We believe our servers are top notch and deliver the edge over others.
Our latest plans are as below:

Linux VPS Servers:

VPS Basic
  • CPU: 2 vCPUs
  • HDD: 40 GB
  • Bandwidth: 1TB
  • RAM: 2 GB
  • Dedicated IP: 1
  • Price: $29.99/month

VPS Standard
  • CPU: 4 vCPUs
  • HDD: 60 GB
  • Bandwidth: 1.5 TB
  • RAM: 4 GB
  • Dedicated IP: 1
  • Price: $44.99/month

VPS Enterprise
  • CPU: 6 vCPUs
  • HDD: 80 GB
  • Bandwidth: 2 TB
  • RAM: 6 GB
  • Dedicated IP: 1
  • Price: $59.99/month

VPS Corporate
  • CPU: 8 vCPUs
  • HDD: 100 GB
  • Bandwidth: 3 TB
  • RAM: 8 GB
  • Dedicated IP: 1
  • Price: $74.99/month

VPS Corporate
